metadata.Title: CVE-2014-2554 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
OTRS 3.1.x before 3.1.21, 3.2.x before 3.2.16, and 3.3.x before 3.3.6allows remote attackers to conduct clickjacking attacks via an IFRAMEelement.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-2554` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

otrs - 3.3.6-1
otrs2 - 3.3.6-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: otrs2 package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.3.6-1').
